CreateApplicationAndBindLicense.document: 创建应用，并开通license、腾讯特效等
CreateApplicationAndBindLicense.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: vcube.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateApplicationAndBindLicense
<公共请求参数>

{
    "AppName": "abc",
    "BundleId": "abc",
    "PackageName": "abc",
    "ResourceIds": [
        "abc"
    ],
    "CompanyPermit": "abc",
    "CompanyType": "abc",
    "CompanyName": "abc",
    "XMagicResourceIds": [
        "abc"
    ],
    "MacBundleId": "abc",
    "WinProcessName": "abc"
}
CreateApplicationAndBindLicense.title: 创建应用并绑定license

POST / HTTP/1.1

}

CreateTrialApplicationAndLicense.document: 创建测试应用并开通测试 license

POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: vcube.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json

<公共请求参数>

{
    "AppName": "QQ",
    "BundleId": "com.company.appName",
    "PackageName": "com.company.appName",
    "FeatureIds": [
        3,
        16
    ],
    "PlanList": [
        "S1-04"
    ]
}

    ]
}

ModifyLicense.document:
正式license 升降配，点播精简版、基础版
 两种情况可以变更：
 1. 精简版可以升级到基础版
 2. 基础版即将过期的时候可以降级到精简版 （7天）
ModifyLicense.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: vcube.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyLicense
<公共请求参数>

{
    "LicenseId": "123",
    "ResourceId": "123"
}
ModifyLicense.title: 更新license
